description: The SPEC_TRANSMTL_LOG table holds an audit log for transmitting results for specimens.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event that caused the result transmittal to occur.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_EVENT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the event template.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of the result transmittal log entry.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record that was transmitted.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_COMMENT
columns.description: Additional comments for the result transmittal audit log entry.

columns.name: TRANSMTL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number of the result transmittal audit log entry.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Result Transmittal: Success


Result Transmittal: Failure


Result Transmittal: Fixed


Normal Print Queue: Success


Normal Print Queue: Failure


Normal Print Queue: Fixed


STAT Print Queue: Success


STAT Print Queue: Failure


STAT Print Queue: Fixed


Interface Triggered: Success


Interface Triggered: Failure


Interface Triggered: Fixed

columns.name: TRANSMIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when result transmittal occurred in UTC.
